name: student's t
description: Statistical test comparing means of one or two groups.

name: average r
description: Average of correlation coefficients.

name: average r (Fisher-Z)
description: Average of correlation coefficients after Fisher's r-to-z transformation.

name: pearson r
description: Measure of linear correlation between two variables.

name: average fisher's r-to-z
description: Transformation to normalize Pearson's correlation.

name: fisher's r-to-z
description: Transformation to normalize Pearson's correlation.

name: welch's t
description: T-test for comparing means with unequal variances.

name: cohen's d
description: Effect size measure for the difference between two means.

name: spearman's rho
description: Measure of rank correlation between two variables.

name: p
description: Probability of observing the test results under the null hypothesis.

name: percent overlap
description: Proportion of subjects in a group who meet the threshold

name: disconnection-based brain connectivity
description: Measure of brain network disruption due to lesions or damage.

name: disconnected streamline map
description: Visualization of disconnected white matter tracts.

name: percent fiber disconnection map
description: Map showing percentage of disconnected fibers in brain regions.

name: track density imaging fiber map
description: Visualization of fiber density using tractography data.

name: parcel disconnection connectogram
description: Circular diagram showing disconnections between brain parcels.

name: parcel disconnection edge measures
description: Metrics of disconnection between pairs of brain parcels.

name: parcel disconnection network measures
description: Graph theory metrics applied to disconnected brain networks.

name: parcel disconnection node measures
description: Metrics of disconnection for individual brain parcels.

name: parcel disconnection percentage matrix
description: Matrix showing percent disconnection between brain parcels.

name: parcel disconnection percentage spared matrix
description: Matrix showing percent of preserved connections between parcels.

name: parcel disconnection raw matrix
description: Matrix of raw disconnection values between brain parcels.

name: parcel disconnection raw tractography
description: Tractography data showing disconnected fibers between parcels.

name: parcel disconnection spared edge measures
description: Metrics of preserved connections between pairs of parcels.

name: parcel disconnection spared node measures
description: Metrics of preserved connections for individual parcels.

name: parcel disconnection track density imaging
description: TDI applied to disconnected fibers between brain parcels.

name: parcel damage array
description: Array of damage values for each brain parcel.

name: parcel damage map
description: Visualization of damage across brain parcels.

name: parcel shortest structural path length delta matrix
description: Matrix of SSPL changes due to disconnection.

name: parcel shortest structural path length edge measures
description: SSPL metrics for connections between pairs of parcels.

name: parcel shortest structural path length indirect edge measures
description: Indirect SSPL metrics between pairs of parcels.

name: parcel shortest structural path length indirect matrix
description: Matrix of indirect SSPL values between parcels.

name: parcel shortest structural path length indirect node measures
description: Indirect SSPL metrics for individual parcels.

name: parcel shortest structural path length matrix
description: Matrix of SSPL values between brain parcels.

name: parcel shortest structural path length node measures
description: SSPL metrics for individual brain parcels.

name: tract disconnection array
description: Array of disconnection values for white matter tracts.
